name: Česká telekomunikační infrastruktura a.s.
bossPosition: Member of board, Director of PR, security and regulatory affairs
goal:
Česká telekomunikační infrastruktura a.s. owns and operates Czech Republic's largest fixed and mobile communications infrastructure. We provide a wide range of national and international wholesale electronic communications services for other operators and retail service providers.

CETIN was established on 1 June 2015 following the voluntary separation of the former incumbent O2 Czech Republic a.s..
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives:
Regulatory framework for electronic communications services
Digital Single Market Strategy
Digital Agenda
Competition framework and issues
